ðŸ“Š Strategy Deep Dive: Momentum Trader Alpha

Full strategy disclosure:
Trade MON/USDC pairs based on short-term momentum signals. Buy when 15-min volume spikes above 2x average. Sell when price retraces 3% from local high. Max position: 100 MON. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

Risk Management:
- Preset: balanced
- Execution: Onchain with enforced limits
- Custody: Self-custodied BotAccount contract

All trades are verifiable onchain.
Strategy logic is optimized for Monad's 400ms block times.

#Strategy #Transparency #Monad
